author: cms-l1t-offline
body:
This is the 81x version of 80x PR #15689, 
i.e. the L1T Offline Software for September MC production.

This is effectively l1t-integration-v85.1 ported from native CMSSW_8_0_19 to CMSSW_8_1_X_2016-09-04-2300)

The 81x and 80x versions give bitwise identical results when emulating L1T using unpacked TPs 
(i.e. on 2015 data, 2016 data). Diff comparison plots of unit tests comparing  80x and 81x are available [here](http://rekovic.web.cern.ch/rekovic/cms/L1T/Stage2/l1t-integration/compare_test_l1t_integration_v85.1_vs_test_l1t_integration_v85.1_CMSSW_81x/)
showing only differences in emulation of MC including emulation of TPs.

Would like to reproduce bitwise equivalence when emulating on MC from detector digis (i.e. include emulation of TPs) but not sure what is the correct GlobalTag for 81x to ensure the same TP configuration as in 80x.
title: Pr81x l1t-tsg-v9 for Sept 2016 MC production
